snippet: Butch Jones, who was hired by Tennessee as the successor to Derek Dooley, becomes the Volunteers’ fourth coach in six seasons.
abstract: Tennessee hires Butch Jones to replace Derek Dooley as head football coach; Jones will be Tennessee's fourth coach in six seasons.
lead_paragraph: Butch Jones, who was hired by Tennessee as the successor to Derek Dooley, becomes the Volunteers’ fourth coach in six seasons.

headline.main: Cincinnati’s Jones Takes Over as Coach of Volunteers
